alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:48PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Montgomery County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Stanton, or 12 miles east of Red Oak, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Montgomery County, including the following locations... Viking Lake State Park and Hacklebarney Woods County Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
